title: Automation Game Creators
description: Taking a break from drop-bears, home built rally cars, and rogue Darbys this week we're joined by Andrew Lamb and Caswal Parker of Camshaft Sofware the company behind Automation.  If your memory is up to snuff you may remember these guys from the New Zealand adventures last year; this time they're stateside and heading to GDC in San Francisco.  In addition we're joined by Thad fresh off a flight from the UAE where he has been working for the last month.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
